duties_responsibilities.duty: Write NCLEX & NGN style questions across the varying body systems & NCLEX client needs.
Work with a team of educators and subject matter experts to deliver high-quality content on (or ahead of) schedule.
Write NCLEX-RN or NCLEX-PN questions for prep products across all the various body systems and client needs.

education_certification.credential: Freelance Item writer with at least 3 years of experience or nursing instructors/educators with at least 5 years of experience writing NCLEX style questions for your students exams.
Must have worked for (or contracted with) Kaplan, Uworld, ElSevier, NCSB, or ATI.
Experience working with the NCSBN (National Council of State Boards of Nursing) in writing/developing NCLEX questions.
